Christina McAnea (amụrụ n'afọ 1958) bụ onye isi otu ọrụ na Scotland.  bu onye ndu otu ndi ahia nke Scotland.  A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Unison n'ọnọdụ nke Dave Prentis
Wee weghara ọkwa ahụ na 22 Jenụwarị 2021.
A mụrụ Christina McAnea na 1958 na Glasgow wee tolite na mpaghara Drumchapel, ebe ọ gara St
Pius School (ugbu a ebe Drumchapel High School). Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Civil Service, National Health Service na retail, tupu ọ gaa na Mahadum Strathclyde iji mụọ Bekee na akụkọ ihe mere eme..
Mgbe mahadum gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Glasgow City Council dị ka onye ọrụ ụlọ tupu ọ malite ịrụ ọrụ maka GMB, ebe ọ dụrụ ndị ọrụ ọdụ ka ha na-ekpe ikpe n'ihu ndị were ha n'ọrụ..
McAnea rụrụ ọrụ na Unison kemgbe e guzobere ya na 1993

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mbụ na National and Local Government Officers' Association (NALGO), na mbụ dị ka onye isi ụmụ nwanyị, tupu e jikọta ya na Unison. Ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị odeakwụkwọ ukwu ise nke Unison na Mee 2018.

A họpụtara McAnea ka ọ nọchie Dave Prentis ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Unison na 11 Jenụwarị 2021, mgbe ọ nwetasịrị 47.7% nke votu ndị otu.  Prentis abụrụla odeakwụkwọ ukwu afọ iri abụọ.  Ọ malitere ọrụ na Jenụwarị 22, 2021..
McAnea luru di ma bikwara na ndịda London. O nwere ụmụ abụọ ndị toro eto. McAnea soro ma bụru kwa onye otu Labour Party
Na mbido afọ 1980, ọ bụ onye otu Communist Party of Great Britain (CPGB).
